snippet: The blast occurred in Shandong Province on Monday night, according to a report in the Chinese news media, and the fire was put out by early Tuesday.
lead_paragraph: The blast occurred in Shandong Province on Monday night, according to a report in the Chinese news media, and the fire was put out by early Tuesday.

headline.main: Explosion at Chinese Chemical Plant Is Said to Kill at Least 1
